1 #!/usr/bin/env python

3 # Libs
4 import copy
5 
6 import rospy
7 import tf2_ros
8 import niryo_robot_poses_handlers.transform_functions as transformations
9 import threading
10 import numpy as np
11 
12 # Messages
13 from geometry_msgs.msg import TransformStamped, Vector3, Quaternion
14 from visualization_msgs.msg import Marker
15 
16 
17 class PosesTransformHandler:
18  """
19  This class uses a tfBuffer to handle transforms related to the vision kit.
20  """
21 
22  def __init__(self, grip_manager, pose_handler_node):
23  self.__tf_buffer = tf2_ros.Buffer()
24  self.__debug_stop_event = threading.Event()
25  self.__debug_thread = None
26  self.__debug_current_ws = None # only for debugging purposes
27  self.__pose_handler_node = pose_handler_node
28  self.__grip_manager = grip_manager
29 
30  def __del__(self):
31  self.disable_debug()
32 
33  def set_relative_pose_object(self, workspace, x_rel, y_rel, yaw_rel, yaw_center=None):
34  """
35  Updates the transform base_link -> object_base in local tfBuffer
36 
37  :param workspace: reference workspace object
38  :param x_rel: object base x position relative to workspace
39  :param y_rel: object base y position relative to workspace
40  :param yaw_rel: object base rotation on z relative to workspace
41  :param yaw_center: Avoid over rotation
42  """
43  tmp_buffer = tf2_ros.Buffer()
44  stamp = rospy.Time.now()
45  delta_x = transformations.euclidian_dist(workspace.points[1], workspace.points[0]) * x_rel
46  delta_y = transformations.euclidian_dist(workspace.points[3], workspace.points[0]) * y_rel
47 
48  t = TransformStamped()
49  t.transform.translation = Vector3(delta_y, delta_x, 0)
50  t.transform.rotation = Quaternion(*transformations.quaternion_from_euler(0, 0, -yaw_rel))
51  t.header.frame_id = str(workspace.name)
52  t.header.stamp = stamp
53  t.child_frame_id = "object_base"
54  tmp_buffer.set_transform(t, "default_authority")
55 
56  transform_frame = self.__pose_handler_node.dynamic_frame_manager.dict_dynamic_frame[workspace.name]["transform"]
57  transform = copy.deepcopy(transform_frame)
58  transform.header.frame_id = "base_link"
59  transform.header.stamp = stamp
60  tmp_buffer.set_transform(transform, "default_authority")
61 
62  # Correcting yaw to avoid out of reach targets
63  t = tmp_buffer.lookup_transform("base_link", "object_base", rospy.Time(0))
64  roll, pitch, yaw = transformations.euler_from_quaternion([t.transform.rotation.x, t.transform.rotation.y,
65  t.transform.rotation.z, t.transform.rotation.w])
66  if yaw_center is not None:
67  if yaw < yaw_center - np.pi / 2:
68  yaw += np.pi
69  elif yaw > yaw_center + np.pi / 2:
70  yaw -= np.pi
71  t.header.stamp = rospy.Time.now()
72  t.transform.rotation = Quaternion(*transformations.quaternion_from_euler(roll, pitch, yaw))
73  self.__tf_buffer.set_transform(t, "default_authority")
74 
75  def set_grip(self, grip):
76  """
77  Updates the transform object_base -> tool_link_target in local tfBuffer
78  :param grip:
79 
80  """
81  if grip.transform.header.frame_id != "object_base":
82  rospy.logerr("Poses Transform Handler - Grip transform need to have header frame 'object_base'")
83  return False
84 
85  if grip.transform.child_frame_id != "tool_link_target":
86  rospy.logerr("Poses Transform Handler - Grip transform need to have child frame 'tool_link_target'")
87  return False
88 
89  grip.transform.header.stamp = rospy.Time.now()
90 
91  self.__tf_buffer.set_transform(grip.transform, "default_authority")
92  return True
93 
94  def get_object_base_transform(self):
95  """
96  Reads the transform base_link -> object_base from local tfBuffer
97 
98  :returns: transform base_link -> object_base
99  """
100  return self.__tf_buffer.lookup_transform("base_link", "object_base", rospy.Time(0))
101 
102  def get_gripping_transform(self):
103  """
104  Reads the transform base_link -> tool_link_target from local tfBuffer
105 
106  :returns: transform base_link -> tool_link_target
107  """
108 
109  tmp_buffer = tf2_ros.Buffer()
110  stamp = rospy.Time.now()
111 
112  t = self.__tf_buffer.lookup_transform("base_link", "object_base", rospy.Time(0))
113  t.header.stamp = stamp
114  tmp_buffer.set_transform(t, "default_authority")
115 
116  t = self.__tf_buffer.lookup_transform("object_base", "tool_link_target", rospy.Time(0))
117  t.header.stamp = stamp
118  tmp_buffer.set_transform(t, "default_authority")
119 
120  return tmp_buffer.lookup_transform("base_link", "tool_link_target", rospy.Time(0))
121 
122  def get_object_transform(self, x_off=0.0, y_off=0.0, z_off=0.0, roll_off=0.0, pitch_off=1.5708, yaw_off=0.0):
123  """
124  Reads the transform base_link -> object_base from local tfBuffer
125 
126  :returns: transform base_link -> object_base
127  """
128  t_base_to_object = self.__tf_buffer.lookup_transform("base_link", "object_base", rospy.Time(0))
129  t_object_to_pick = self.transform_from_euler(x_off,
130  y_off,
131  z_off,
132  roll_off,
133  pitch_off,
134  yaw_off,
135  "object_base",
136  "pick_target",
137  t_base_to_object.header.stamp)
138  self.__tf_buffer.set_transform(t_object_to_pick, "default_authority")
139 
140  return self.__tf_buffer.lookup_transform("base_link", "pick_target", rospy.Time(0))
141 
142  def get_calibration_tip_position(self, robot_pose):
143  """
144  Retrieves the position of the calibration tip from a given robot pose.
145 
146  :param robot_pose: pose of the robot's tool_link
147  :returns: xyz position of calibration tip in robot coordinates
148  """
149  stamp = rospy.Time.now()
150  # First apply transform for robot pose
151  base_link_to_tool_link = self.transform_from_euler(robot_pose.position.x,
152  robot_pose.position.y,
153  robot_pose.position.z,
154  robot_pose.rpy.roll,
155  robot_pose.rpy.pitch,
156  robot_pose.rpy.yaw,
157  "base_link",
158  "tool_link")
159  base_link_to_tool_link.header.stamp = stamp
160  self.__tf_buffer.set_transform(base_link_to_tool_link, "default_authority")
161 
162  # Getting calibration tip
163  calibration_tip_grip = self.__grip_manager.read("default_Calibration_Tip")
164  tool_link_to_calib_tip = calibration_tip_grip.transform
165  tool_link_to_calib_tip.header.frame_id = "tool_link"
166  tool_link_to_calib_tip.header.stamp = stamp
167  tool_link_to_calib_tip.child_frame_id = "calibration_tip"
168 
169  self.__tf_buffer.set_transform(tool_link_to_calib_tip, "default_authority")
170  base_link_to_calib_tip = self.__tf_buffer.lookup_transform("base_link", "calibration_tip", rospy.Time(0))
171 
172  calib_tip_position = base_link_to_calib_tip.transform.translation
173  # rospy.loginfo("Base Link -> Tool Link : {}".format(base_link_to_tool_link.transform.translation))
174  # rospy.loginfo("Base Link -> Calib Tip : {}".format(base_link_to_calib_tip.transform.translation))
175  return calib_tip_position
176 
177  @staticmethod
178  def transform_from_euler(x, y, z, roll, pitch, yaw, header_frame_id, child_frame_id, stamp=None):
179  """
180  Creates a new stamped transform from translation and euler-orientation
181 
182  :param x: x translation
183  :param y: y translation
184  :param z: z translation
185  :param roll: orientation roll
186  :param pitch: orientation pitch
187  :param yaw: orientation yaw
188  :param header_frame_id: transform from this frame
189  :param child_frame_id: transform to this frame
190  :param stamp: the timestamp of the transform. Default = current time
191 
192  :returns: transform
193  """
194  if stamp is None:
195  stamp = rospy.Time.now()
196  t = TransformStamped()
197  t.transform.translation.x = x
198  t.transform.translation.y = y
199  t.transform.translation.z = z
200 
201  q = transformations.quaternion_from_euler(roll, pitch, yaw)
202  t.transform.rotation.x = q[0]
203  t.transform.rotation.y = q[1]
204  t.transform.rotation.z = q[2]
205  t.transform.rotation.w = q[3]
206 
207  t.header.frame_id = header_frame_id
208  t.header.stamp = stamp
209  t.child_frame_id = child_frame_id
210 
211  return t
212 
213  def enable_debug(self):
214  """
215  Start publishing debug information on /tf and /visualization_marker for
216  debugging using rviz. This will happen in a separate thread.
217  """
218  self.__debug_thread = threading.Thread(target=self.__debug_loop, name="Poses Transform Handler Debug Thread")
219  self.__debug_thread.start()
220 
221  def disable_debug(self):
222  """
223  Stop publishing debug inforation
224  """
225  self.__debug_stop_event.set()
226  if self.__debug_thread is not None:
227  self.__debug_thread.join()
228 
229  def __debug_loop(self):
230  """
231  Debug loop that will run in a separate thread.
232  (tfBuffer should be threadsafe)
233  """
234  broadcaster = tf2_ros.TransformBroadcaster()
235  rviz_marker_pub = rospy.Publisher('/visualization_marker', Marker, queue_size=1000)
236  rate = rospy.Rate(5)
237  while not self.__debug_stop_event.is_set() and not rospy.is_shutdown():
238  if self.__debug_current_ws is None:
239  rospy.logerr("Poses Transform Handler - Could not publish debug tf, no workspace set.")
240  rate.sleep()
241  continue
242 
243  try:
244  broadcaster.sendTransform(
245  self.__tf_buffer.lookup_transform("base_link", self.__debug_current_ws.name, rospy.Time(0)))
246  broadcaster.sendTransform(
247  self.__tf_buffer.lookup_transform(self.__debug_current_ws.name, "object_base", rospy.Time(0)))
248  broadcaster.sendTransform(
249  self.__tf_buffer.lookup_transform("object_base", "tool_link_target", rospy.Time(0)))
250  except tf2_ros.LookupException as e:
251  rospy.logerr("Poses Transform Handler - Could not publish debug tf: {}".format(e))
252 
253  for i in range(4): # Iterate over the 4 markers defining the workspace
254  msg = Marker()
255  msg.header.frame_id = "base_link"
256  msg.id = i
257  msg.type = 2 # It correspond to a sphere which will be drawn
258 
259  msg.pose.position.x = self.__debug_current_ws.points[i][0]
260  msg.pose.position.y = self.__debug_current_ws.points[i][1]
261  msg.pose.position.z = self.__debug_current_ws.points[i][2]
262 
263  msg.scale.x = 0.005
264  msg.scale.y = 0.005
265  msg.scale.z = 0.005
266 
267  msg.color.r = 1.0 if i == 0 or i == 3 else 0.0
268  msg.color.g = 1.0 if i == 1 or i == 3 else 0.0
269  msg.color.b = 1.0 if i == 2 or i == 3 else 0.0
270  msg.color.a = 1.0
271 
272  rviz_marker_pub.publish(msg)
273 
274  rate.sleep()
